title: Three Beans Salad 🥗
content:
Breakfast Salad - Healthy three Beans Salad 🥗  Servings: 5 Duration: 10 mins Salad is a healthy and nutrition bowl where you can eat at any time in a day. You can make your own salad bowl it can be with veggies or quinoa or beans or fruits to enhance the flavor of salad add little pepper & salt. Any body can cook any kind of salad because they are very easy to prepare with less ingredients & in less time. Salad can be mixed veggies or fruits or beans it's all your choice and make out best combination for healthy salad 🥗 One full bowl of salad makes your stomach full because it contains high nutrition values. These salad's suites to any age group & it's super yummy 😋 Nutrition Facts: Red kidney Beans: It contains vitamin B1,k , iron , magnesium, manganese , folate, potassium, copper, phosphorus & protein White beans: It contains vitamins C & B6 and also iron, calcium, potassium, magnesium & protein Brown chickpeas: It contains protein & sodium Celery: It contains vitamin A & C and also calcium, magnesium, sodium and potassium Yellow Bell pepper: It contains A,C & B6 and also calcium, iron, potassium & magnesium Cilantro : Vitamins A & C Lemon Juice : It contains Vitamins C & B6 and also calcium, iron, potassium & magnesium Today I prepared a full bowl of healthy & nutrition salad with beans, veggies, salt  & pepper Let's start with ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients: Red kidney Beans - 80 gms White Beans/ Northern Beans - 80 gms Brown chickpeas - 80 gms Celery - 1/2 cup Cucumber - 1/2 cup Yellow Bell Pepper - 1/4 cup Honey - 1 tb sp Salt - 1/2 tsp Lemon juice - 1 tb sp Pepper powder - 1/2 tsp Extra virgin Oilve oil - 1/2 tb sp Chopped cilantro - 1/4 cup Procedure: Pre-preparation:
  • Take a bowl
  • Add three Beans in it
  • Wash twice and drain water
  • Add fresh water & soak 6-8 hrs
  • After 8 hrs, cook them in pressure cooker by adding sufficient water & salt to taste
  • Cook for 3 whistles
  • Drain water in a bowl & keep aside
  • Cooked beans ready
[caption id="attachment_5862" align="alignnone" width="1462"] Beans cooking process[/caption] Three Beans Salad:
  • First mix honey, olive oil & lemon juice till incorporated
  • Second, mix chopped veggies: Celery, cucumber & yellow bell pepper in a bowl
  • Keep aside
  • Next take a deep bowl , add mixed liquid & mixed veggies
  • Add chopped cilantro
  • Add three variety of cooked beans
  • Sprinkle salt & pepper
  • Mix well or mix gently with two spoons
  • That's it, here you go and taste delicious & healthy Three beans salad 🥗
  • Enjoy your day & Happy Cooking 😊

[caption id="attachment_5864" align="alignnone" width="1020"] Step by step process with pictures: Three Beans Salad 🥗[/caption] Note:
  • Adjut spices according to taste
  • Don't over cook beans because they might become mushy
  • You can add garbanzo beans instead of brown chickpeas
  • Don't refrigerate salad, it spoils the taste
